channel.title: Hi need help with PI client
channel.description:
I try to make my server into a webclient but i get this error im new at this :(
EDIT:Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60 its my last error and i get 1,2,3,4,5 errors can please help me =(

item.title: Hi need help with PI client
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Your grammar is horrible, sorry.

From what you said, it sounds like the client cant connect to your server’s IP address. That’s the first thing I would check. The second, is that it is possibly unable to download the cache. Check the link its downloading from as well.

Read full topic
item.source: Hi need help with PI client
